settings.size_fit_desc:
• Immersive 21.5" HD Rotatable Touchscreen: dive into full-body workouts
  • Screen rotation for easy transitions to strength, sculpt, stretch, and more
  • Sleek Swiss Design that blends precision, durability and elegance
  • Advanced Auto Resistance System that automatically adjusts to match instructor recommendations
  • Innovative Smart Saddle Detection+ that detects in and out of saddle riding via sensors to deliver intense and fulfilling results
  • Tailored Workouts with Personal Trainer Algorithm that evaluates each rider's performance
  • Ride, Earn, and Enjoy Cash Rewards
  • Fresh, Gamified Workouts Updated Daily
  • Real-time In-workout Metrics
  • Sync with Your Heart Rate Monitor for Comprehensive Tracking
  • Space-saving Design: Fits within the Size of a Yoga Mat

settings.product_desc_title: Premium Home Gym With Gamified Techs

Starting 11/1/23, you can place your order now with confidence! You'll be getting all freebeat bikes at the season's lowest price - guaranteed.

settings.prop_des: Lit Bike's intelligent hardware suite boasts a 21.5" rotatable HD touchscreen, an intuitive Auto Resistance System, and pioneering Smart Saddle Detection, ensuring a cutting-edge cycling experience.
A showcase of Swiss precision, durability and elegance. A wood-covered flywheel blends innovative design and natural aesthetics, delivering a premium riding experience.
Exciting and engaging classes at home. No extra equipment or shoes to start riding!
A variety of aesthetics, colors, and designs by experts in Switzerland to match any room.

settings.swiperDes: "Take your fitness journey to the next level"
"Always step off the bike in a better mood"
"First stationary bikes to turn spinning into a game"
"Shines as a high-quality, technology-enhanced home cardio exercise bike"
"Leading players in the stationary indoor exercise bike"
"Classes to rev up your heart rate"
"Get into cycling and have room to progress"
"Auto Resistance System that matches its rider"

settings.video_introduce_desc: Lit Bike showcases Swiss precision, durability and elegance. With a wood-covered flywheel, it seamlessly blends innovative design and natural aesthetics, delivering a premium riding experience.

settings.fpc_video_desc: Artist-generated interactive 3D stages turn every room into an immersive workout via our 21.5" HD touchscreen.
Rotate the screen to seamlessly transition between a staggering array of cycling, stretching, strength training, and more classes all under one roof.
Auto-adjusts based on the instructor's cue and adapts to each unique riding style.
Detects in and out of saddle riding via sensors to deliver intense and fulfilling results.
Evaluates each rider's performance and applies the perfect balance of a challenging yet fun intensity to push every rider at the right speed, level, and time.

settings.pages_swiper_Info: Led by expert instructors and set to the beat of the hottest tunes, get your heart racing and your body moving.
Sculpt and tone your muscles, while simultaneously improving your flexibility and range of motion. With each rep and stretch, you'll feel the beat pulsating through your body.
Amplify your workout experience with Rhythm Game! It's the perfect combination of fitness and music. Step to the beat and let loose in our exhilarating music game.
With stunning visuals and immersive soundscapes, you'll feel like you're cycling through the mountains, across the beach, and through bustling cities.
Participate in organized events, earn rewards by achieving goals. Enhance fitness routine, complete tasks, redeem points for cash rewards!

settings.boomlg_desc: Show off your competitive side in our always-updating games and challenges.
Challenge friends and family for the best score. Climb up the leaderboard to make the most of your home fitness adventure.
Experience a fun interactive game in which you ride to the rhythm and score by your rhythmic pedal accuracy.
Our sensors won't miss a single pedal and receive instant performance tracking results at every beat.
Experience studio fitness from the comfort of your own home with thousands of on-demand classes to choose from every day.

settings.boomlg_max_desc: Earn rewards, points, and fame by competing against friends in freebeat fitness challenges, events, and games.

settings.fsc_cheap_than: Cheaper than your average coffee shop visit!
settings.fsc_cheap_based: Based on a 5 years time horizon with best 36 month payment financing offer.

settings.learn_more_desc: Take your fitness routine into your own hands with the freebeatfit Moonbow Beige spin bike. This dreamy stationary bike might be a beauty, but it’s also a beast. With its innovative, smart design, unique immersive environment, and thousands of fully gamified workout options, the freebeat™ Moonbow Beige exercise bike takes home fitness to a new level.

settings.swiperDes: Enjoy warranty for up to 10 years on bike components and parts.
Immersive fitness with easy monthly payments and no hidden fees.
Our customer service team will find you the best solution.

settings.online_reviews_text: "When you've assembled and ridden as many bikes as I have, you start to know a quality build. This thing was just built well! I was impressed and I think it's a model that will last a long time!"

"Whoa, when you are riding there will be a light that pops up under the bike and it adds a premium element to the bike. I have never seen this with another bike before I think it's a really cool feature!"
"Resistance works pretty snappy and the resistance goes pretty darn high and it changes pretty quickly and the bike has a good feel overall. It is a party right away!"
"The huge screen and one-on-one lessons feature great instructors from around the world with really cool music! If you're looking for great music and just a great workout, it's fantastic!"

settings.online_reviews_title: Riding in Style with the Lit Bike
settings.online_reviews_text: "Great durability and stability, helping create the smooth, consistent pedal stroke that you want. The wood panel is fun I feel like it adds a little bit of extra flair!"

settings.bury_freebeat_title: Why Invest in a Moonbow Beige Spin Bike From freebeat™?
settings.bury_freebeat_info1: This is the decade of home workouts, but most gym equipment doesn’t work in every home. That’s part of the beauty of the freebeat™ Moonbow Beige Lit Bike. It features a sleek Swiss design that can fit on a yoga mat so that it won’t crowd your space. Plus, it comes in an ethereal shade of Moonbow Beige, like the LBD of home decor — it goes with everything! Aesthetics is just a fraction of what makes your freebeat™ Lit Bike Moonbow Beige so unique. Working out will feel like you’re in a real-life video game thanks to your bike’s high-tech visuals, pumping tunes, and first-class fitness instruction. You can even bring the social element of gaming into your workout by connecting with other freebeat™ cyclists or challenging your squad to some friendly competition.

settings.bury_freebeat_title: How Does freebeat™ Deliver an Authentic Cycling Experience at Home?
settings.bury_freebeat_info1: our beige cycling bike delivers a massive range of heart-pumping, immersive workouts. You can choose from thousands of gamified classes and workout experiences with their own soundtrack and choreography. The freebeat™ also features an auto-resistance system, so you don’t need to adjust programming during your workout. You can track your progress and stats in real-time without taking your eyes off the screen.

settings.bury_freebeat_title: What Can I Expect From the freebeat™ Moonbow Beige Cycling Bike?
settings.bury_freebeat_info1: The freebeat™ Moonbow Beige cycling bike is one of our Premium Lit home cardio machines and offers the following:
settings.bury_freebeat_info2: Modern Swiss Design: Freebeat™ Lit bikes were engineered in Switzerland, home to some of the sleekest, most appealing designs in history. There’s nothing clunky about our bikes; they look like a statement piece in your home. Gamified Workouts: Love gaming? The freebeat™ Moonbow makes you the main character. Our interactive workouts feature artist-generated backgrounds, unforgettable soundtracks, and endless opportunities to revolutionize how you work out.
settings.bury_freebeat_info3: 22” Interactive HD Touch Screen: Your freebeat™ bike features a 180-degree rotating HD touch screen, so you can seamlessly immerse yourself into thousands of interactive classes. Auto Resistance System: No need to choose settings. Depending on your unique needs and abilities, your Moonbow beige cycling bike will intuitively set your ideal resistance level. Prefer to choose your resistance manually? You got it! Smart Saddle Detection+: Safety first! Your Moonbow beige cycling bike isn’t just elegant — it’s smart. Thanks to innovative, smart saddle sensors, it can also detect when you get off the bike.

settings.bury_freebeat_desc: You asked, and we have answers.

settings.fb_stage_desc: 1) Monthly payment for freebeat bike is based on 36 months at 0% APR and $0 down. Financing does not include the cost of freebeat all-access membership (approximately $39/mo). settings.fb_stage_desc_seconds: 2) freebeat membership ($39/mo) required to access full content on freebeat bikes.
